titleStmt.title: King Solomons's infallible expedient for three kingdoms settlement: or, Better men make better times. Delivered in a sermon preached in the renowned and famous city of Gloucester, the Lord's day before their election of burgesses for Parliament. By Samuel Keme S.S.T.B. rector of Allbery, near Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Kem, Samuel, 1604-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.S. for S. Sawbridge, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible on Lud-Gate Hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible on Lud-Gate Hill
